entries.journal_entry_description: Visit Loche and Rydel to complete your smuggler training.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Visit Loche and complete his training.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Next, visit Rydel for melee combat training. You never know when you'll need your fists. Better get acquainted with it now, kid.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Visit Rydel and complete his training.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Now for the real stuff. Come back, kid. I have a job for you. It's time to learn the trick of your trade: smuggling.
